item.description: Come join us as we continue to explore what values we'd like to incorporate in a new cohousing community in the Valley - affordability, senior-friendly for all us boomers, walkability, and connection to nature. How do we garden and be able to walk to a cafe, library, movies, etc? Can we create a multi-generational community and still have it serve the interests and desires of active adults who want to age in place with vibrant community around us? Come and discuss with us!
item.name: Cohousing Explorers Gathering in Amherst
